Package org.mongodb.morphia.converters

Defines the standard set of Converters provided by Morphia

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SimpleValueConverter
    Marker interface that the TypeConverter returns simple values (int/long, string, etc...)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BooleanConverter  
    ByteConverter  
    CharacterConverter  
    CharArrayConverter  
    ClassConverter  
    Converters
    Defines a bundle of converters
    CustomConverters
    Defines a bundle of converters that will delegate to the DefaultConverters for unknown types but provides a chance to override the converter used for different types.
    DateConverter  
    DefaultConverters
    Default encoders
    DoubleConverter  
    EnumConverter  
    EnumSetConverter  
    FloatConverter  
    IdentityConverter  
    IntegerConverter  
    IterableConverter  
    KeyConverter  
    LocaleConverter
    Converts a Locale to/from a valid database structure.
    LongConverter  
    MapOfValuesConverter  
    ObjectIdConverter
    Convert to an ObjectId from string
    SerializedObjectConverter  
    ShortConverter  
    StringConverter  
    TimestampConverter  
    TypeConverter  
    URIConverter  
    UUIDConverter
    provided by http://code.google.com/p/morphia/issues/detail?id=320
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConverterException
    Indicates an error occurred trying to convert a value.
    ConverterNotFoundException  

Package org.mongodb.morphia.converters Description

Defines the standard set of Converters provided by Morphia
